page.title: 01GAZETTEER
page.content: Our area,which is called Sumburgh is in the south end of{Shetland.}It is 338 km NE of Aberdeen.It has a varied coastline of cliffs and beaches.We have 3 beaches{:West Voe,Grutness}and {Virkie Pool.Virkie Pool}is a tidal basin and is ideal for wading birds. The highest hill is{Compass Head}which stands at 101m. The east side of{ {Compass Head}has high cliffs where a great variety of sea-birds roost.There are 2 large peninsulas in our area,{ {Sumburgh Head}and{Scatness.}Between these 2 there is a large inlet called{ {West Voe.}Below{Compass Head}on the large flat piece of land{Sumburgh {Airport}is based. It is the most important airport in{Shetland.}In the south the land is mostly covered with heather but has some rough grazing and housing. Our area's economy boomed when oil was discovered in the{North
